subtitle: A very easy and tasty Indian curry made from minded beef or lamb. Tinned tomatoes can be used instead of yogurt, if preferred.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Fry the onion until light brown. Add the cinnamon stick, small and large cardamoms, and the bay leaf. Fry for 1 min.
Add the minced meat. Sprinkle on the spices. Mix well. Fry for 2-3 min to brown the meat.
Add the yogurt (or tomatoes) and salt. Cover and cook gently for 10 min, until mince is dry.
Uncover. Add the peas. Cook gently for 10 min.

title: Keema - mince curry
